description:
Power Up Your Resilience is a practical, evidence based course which has the potential to change your health, your thinking and your life. The course is broken down into 7, easy to watch videos and supporting chapters from Dr Sven Hansen’s latest book Inside-Out for a deeper dive into each topic.

Never before has Resilience been so critical in maintaining our wellbeing, supporting safe and productive careers and building strong families and communities. We define Resilience as the learned ability to demonstrate Bounce, Courage, Connection and Creativity.

Learning how to get a good night’s sleep, prevent diabetes, become calm and focused in the height of "battle", connect meaningfully with others in challenging situations, or simply lift your happiness are just a few of the successes you can expect from this training.

If you want to:

  • Feel calmer
  • Remove anxiety from your life
  • Sleep better
  • Be more active
  • Enjoy good health
  • Manage your emotions better
  • Be happy and fulfilled

    This course is for YOU!
title: Power Up your Resilience
